positive_examples: This is an example of activation boundary.
The activation boundary demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed activation boundary in this context.
A typical case of activation boundary would involve these features.
The concept of activation boundary applies here.
The threshold limits that determine when a concept becomes active or triggered within a system.
negative_examples: This is an example of decision boundary, not activation boundary.
This represents concept boundary in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: DecisionBoundary, or other types of ConceptBoundary

definition: The threshold in activation space that separates when a concept is detected versus not.
